item.title: Abandoned vehicles and no space for me to park my car, 13th October
item.description:
The owner of this vehicle is Akem Wilson Nkwo is my country men, he died last February at Darent valley hospital. I have been trying to reach his family but to no avail, and there is no space to park my own car. Have called DVLA and explained the situation, but the redirected me to you. Please come and evacuate the car so that there will be space for me to park my car. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grange Way, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
